doc.title: Milo
doc.plot: Brand Fincher is traumatized when his son was born with a rare disease, causing excessive growth of hair all over his face and body. He tries to live a normal life with his beautiful wife, hiding his son's condition. The reappearance of his own father after 10 years and the kidnapping of his son Milo, force Brand to face his deeply-buried trauma and he discovers that he is unable to accept his son.
